**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 215 2.0 **Traditions** [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4) **Deities** [Cosmic Caravan](/Deities.aspx?ID=219), [Cosmic Caravan](/Deities.aspx?ID=219) **Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284) **Saving Throw** Will **Duration** 10 minutes --- A flowing cloak of utter darkness drapes over you, filled with pinpricks of light like distant stars. It imparts the stillness of the cosmos to you, granting you a +2 status bonus to [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) checks to [Hide](/Actions.aspx?ID=62) and [Sneak](/Actions.aspx?ID=63). While outside under a starry night sky, you're also [invisible](/Conditions.aspx?ID=26) as long as you remain still. When moving under a starry night sky, you are [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) instead. Gazing too closely into the stars is disorienting. Any creature that ends its turn adjacent to you must attempt a Will save; this is a [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163) effect. **Success** The creature is unaffected.
**Failure** The creature is [dazzled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=7) until the end of its next turn.
**Critical Failure** The creature is [confused](/Conditions.aspx?ID=5) and dazzled until the end of its next turn.
name: Blanket of Stars
